column1: the  Court  of  Appeal  and  therea(cid:332)er  made  an  applica(cid:415)on  to  the  High  Court  to  stay
proceedings since an appeal had been ﬁled. The said applica(cid:415)on had been rejected by the
High Court. It was contended before the Court of Appeal that since a pe(cid:415)(cid:415)on of appeal
had been ﬁled in the Court of Appeal, it was impera(cid:415)ve that proceedings before the High
Court be stayed pending the outcome of the appeal.
